description: The combination of FOREST_, FOREST_ID, MAPSHEET and SRC_FILENAME is a unique identifier across all counties. All four are needed to create the unique id that traces back to the source polygon.
Onlt one forest layer. So any forest polygon will be single layered
Every polygon is either forest or NFL, never both. So num_of_layers will always be 1.
Converts source area from m2 to ha. Return OUT_OF_RANGE for any zero values.
Validates geometry, checks source polygon intersects photoyear polygons and returns value greater than 0, runs the intersect to identify photo year with greatest area overlap
